title: User Review
description: A flat schema for structured 1â€“5 star reviews of tokenized applications or digital services. Designed for onchain attestation and offchain anchoring.

@context.description: Optional JSON-LD context URI for semantic processing.

attester.title: Attester ID
attester.description: Ethereum address or DID of the entity submitting the review.

subject.title: Subject ID
subject.description: DID of the thing being reviewed.

subjectDidHash.title: Subject DID Hash
subjectDidHash.description: Keccak256 hash of the canonicalized subject DID, encoded as 0x-prefixed hex string (32 bytes).

version.title: Subject Version
version.description: Version of the reviewed subject (e.g., app version).

summary.title: Review Summary
summary.description: Short title or headline for the review (e.g., 'Loved it', 'Buggy experience').

reviewBody.title: Review
reviewBody.description: Free-form text describing the user's experience or feedback.

author.title: Author ID
author.description: DID, handle, or name of the user who wrote the review.

screenshotUrls.title: Screenshots
screenshotUrls.description: Optional screenshots showing the app during review.

payloadVersion.title: Payload Version
payloadVersion.description: Semver describing the shape of 'payload' (additive changes may bump this without a new schema UID).

payloadSpecURI.title: Payload Specification URI
payloadSpecURI.description: URI to the JSON schema specification for this attestation type.

algo.title: Payload Spec Hash Algorithm
algo.description: Hash algorithm used for payload specification digest.

hex.title: Payload Spec Hash Value
hex.description: 0x-prefixed hex digest of the payload specification.

payload.title: Review Payload
payload.description: Extended review details. Evolvable without changing the envelope. When stored on-chain via EAS, this object is JSON-stringified.

issuedAt.title: Issued Date
issuedAt.description: Unix timestamp (in seconds) when the review was issued. Default is the current time.

effectiveAt.title: Effective Date
effectiveAt.description: Optional Unix timestamp (in seconds) when the review becomes effective. Default is the current time.

expiresAt.title: Expiration Date
expiresAt.description: Unix timestamp (in seconds) after which the review expires. Leave empty if the review does not expire.
